'''Radiant Spincrystal 132''' is an item used in any [[Furnishing]] of the [[Euphonium Unbound]] series to unlock the [[Soundtrack]] ''[[Arcana of Zipacna]]'' in the [[Serenitea Pot]].

It is located in a [[Saurian]] nest in the [["Children of Echoes"]] Tribe.
